subject: download Dreamweaver
body:
God has placed no limits to the exercise of the intellect he has given us, on this side of the grave.

One shining quality lends a luster to another, or hides some glaring defect.

Temperance is simply a disposition of the mind which binds the passion.

I became insane, with long intervals of horrible sanity.

Modesty the gentle art of enhancing your charm by pretending not to be aware of it.

There is not grief that does not speak.

Fortune is like glass--the brighter the glitter, the more easily broken.

Fear is the sand in the machinery of life.

The nature of peoples is first crude, then severe, then benign, then delicate, finally dissolute.

Beauty is a short-lived tyranny.

None of us liveth to himself, and no man dieth to himself. [Romans 14:7]

If you don't know where you are going, every road will get you nowhere.

Winning breeds confidence and confidence breeds winning.
